prompt: What is the best software for Parsian/Farsi audio-to-text transcription?

hidden_queries: best software for Persian Farsi audio to text transcription
بهترین نرم افزار تبدیل گفتار فارسی به متن Persian audio to text transcription tools
metadata.generated_search_query: best software for Persian Farsi audio to text transcription

sources.title: تایپ متنی صوت و تصویر فارسی به صورت آنلاین و رایگان
sources.snippet: به راحتی با استفاده از ابزار گفتار به نوشتار آنلاین Notta، ضبط‌های صوتی فارسی خود را به متن تبدیل کنید. فایل‌های صوتی را بارگذاری کنید، زبان را انتخاب کنید و به صورت خودکار تبدیل نمایید.

sources.title: Transcribe Persian Audio to Text - Notta
sources.snippet: Notta is the top online Persian transcription software. You can instantly transcribe and translate Persian audio or video to English, German, French, and other languages in minutes.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are the best options for Persian (Farsi) audio-to-text transcription, ranked by usefulness for real transcription work (not just simple voice typing): 1) Notta – Strong, general-purpose online/audio file transcription with editing and export (Word/SRT/TXT). Works well for Persian and supports other languages/translations. Notta+1

sources.title: Free Persian Speech to Text | Transcribe Persian Voice and Audio to Text
sources.snippet: Transcribe Persian speech, voice, and audio to text for free with ElevenLabs. Achieve fast, accurate Persian transcription with our world-leading AI technology.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2) ElevenLabs Speech-to-Text – Good accuracy and low cost tool that handles Persian audio uploads with AI transcription. ElevenLabs
3) Maestra AI – Transcribe Persian audio to text and get transcript editing, keyword extraction, speaker tags, etc., all online. Maestra AI
4) VMEG AI – Quick free Persian transcription with multi-speaker recognition and subtitle export. VMEG AI

sources.title: Persian Speech to Text - Automatic Transcription - VEED.IO
sources.snippet: Convert Persian (Farsi) speech to text in one click. Upload audio, select a language, and auto-transcribe. Transcribe and translate Persian audio with AI.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 5) VEED.io – Transcribes Persian speech to text and also includes video subtitle features; useful if you need editing/export options. VEED.IO
6) Prismascribe.ai – AI-powered Persian transcription with speaker detection and export formats; free starter hours. PrismaScribe
Simple/Free browser tools (lower quality): VoiceToTextOnline – basic free browser conversion (good for quick, direct speech-to-text). Voice to Text Online
TranscribeToText.ai (Persian) – simple online transcription. Transcribe to Text
Kapwing Persian Audio-to-Text – easy, free (limited minutes) with basic editing. Kapwing

sources.title: با این نرم ‌افزارهای تبدیل گفتار به متن فارسی، با تایپ کردن خداحافظی ...
sources.snippet: بهترین نرم‌افزار برای تایپ صوتی در تلفن همراه اگر فقط می‌خواهید با صحبت‌کردن تایپ کنید و قصد تبدیل فایل صوتی یا ویرایش پیشرفته را ندارید، Google Voice Typing بهترین انتخاب است. این ابزار به‌طور شگفت‌انگیزی فارسی را درست ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Mobile solution for typing (not full transcription): Google Voice Typing (Gboard) – very good for live voice typing in Persian (not for uploaded audio). Chikaw

sources.title: Persian Transcription Services Online - Happy Scribe
sources.snippet: Persian Transcription Services with AI & Humans Save time and effort by converting Persian audio or speech to text with AI. Get accurate Persian transcriptions in minutes—perfect for meetings, interviews, and more.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes before choosing: Accuracy varies with audio quality, accent, and background noise. Dedicated services like Notta, ElevenLabs, Maestra tend to outperform simple free tools. If you need human-verified accuracy, services like Happy Scribe (AI + human option) exist but cost more. happyscribe.com
